ClassDef.Name: ProceduralSky

Properties.Name: SunSize
Properties.Description: The size of the sun in the sky.

Properties.Name: SkyTint
Properties.Description: The tint color of the sky.

Properties.Name: HorizonColor
Properties.Description: The color of the horizon in the sky.

Properties.Name: GroundColor
Properties.Description: The color of the ground in the sky.

Properties.Name: Exposure
Properties.Description: The exposure level of the sky.

ClassDef.Description: ProceduralSky is a type of sky that generates its appearance procedurally based on the position of the sun and its properties.
